TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BulletStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the bullet styles you can apply to list items in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The BulletStyle enumeration represents the bullet styles that you can apply to the list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property uses these enumeration values to set the bullet styles in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control. For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to `Disc`, each list item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control will render a filled circle preceding the content of the list item as follows:
- List Item 1
- List Item 2
- List Item 3
Specifying the `CustomImage` bullet style allows you to supply your own image for the bullet. If you specify the `CustomImage` bullet style, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property to the URL of the custom image to use.
If you specify `NotSet`, the browser in which the control is rendered will determine the bullet style to display with the list items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control. A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control is populated with all available BulletStyle enumeration values. The bullet style changes based on the style that the user selects from the list box.
[!code-cs[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_238_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_238_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle Circle = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is an empty circle shape.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle CustomImage = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a custom image.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle Disc = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a filled circle shape.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle LowerAlpha = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a lowercase letter (a, b, c, ...).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle LowerRoman = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a lowercase Roman numeral (i, ii, iii, ...).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle NotSet = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is not set. The browser that renders the control will determine the bullet style to display.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle Numbered = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a number (1, 2, 3, ...).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle Square = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is a filled square shape.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle UpperAlpha = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is an uppercase letter (A, B, C, ...).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle UpperRoman = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The bullet style is an uppercase Roman numeral (I, II, III, ...).
